description_text:
Hello it seems that my hydraulic rod and the plastic bit that holds the spring broke.

Kind regards
Markus

Sent from Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>

conversations.body_text: Hi Markus Andersson,  We can send you a free replacement of the improved version of the damaged pedal. Please let us know whether it is the throttle or the clutch that is damaged, as the video you provided was incomplete and we couldn’t clearly identify the issue.
